      Parameters:

      y - y coordinate value to set

    • createEndGameDialog

      public void createEndGameDialog(int survivorsSaved)
      creates and pop ups end game dialog

      This method creates and pop ups end game dialog. The dialog is created depending on the chosen scenario from GameManager and the amount of survivorsSaved. Adds a listener to the okay button of the dialog to go call UiManager to draw the level selection menu.

      Parameters:
      survivorsSaved - amount of survivors saved
      See Also:
      • createLevelSelection()

    • drawAssets

      public void drawAssets(JPanel panelToDrawOn, Asset[] assets)
      Draws all given assets on given panel

      This method uses UiManager to draw an assetWindow on the given JPanel for each Asset in the asset array.

      Parameters:
      panelToDrawOn - panel to add the created assets to
      assets - all assets to draw
      See Also:
      • Asset.getAmount()
